title: Brownie Mix in a Jar III

content.text: 3/4 cup butter or margarine, softened at room temperature.
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "3/4 cup butter or margarine, softened at room temperature." )

content.text: 0) Mix together flour, salt and baking powder.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Mix"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "flour"@16:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "salt"@23:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "baking powder"@32:45 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add 3/4 cup butter or margarine (do not use diet Magarine).
2) Mix in 2 eggs, slightly beaten and 2 teaspoons vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "2 eggs"@10:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "2 teaspoons vanilla"@38:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( "slightly beaten"@18:33 / OTHER )
)

content.text: 3) Spread batter into a sprayed 9 x 13 inch metal pan.
4) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 25 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "375 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-4-1 "190 degrees C"@26:39 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "25 minutes"@45:55 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Cool"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "15 minutes"@8:18 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "baking pan"@22:32 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
